00008 //IMPORT EXISTING CLIENT SHELL BUT AUTOMATE IT TO READ FROM THE CENSUS FILE AND RUN ACCORDINGLY.
00009 //NOTE: The census file that this reads from has been specifically formatted to meet the specifications of the current server, which is:
00010 /*
00011  * CONNECT, AUTHENTICATE, then use get/set commands.
00012  * ....
00013  * Also note, this program will simply populate the database with entries from the file!
00014  * If successful and there are no errors, we can safely assume that all values are stored properly.
00015  * To test if this is true, we could automate get commands as well to ensure the entries exist.
00016  */

00362 void omit_newLine(char *l)
00363 {
00364         int count = 0;
00365         while(*(l+count) != '\n')
00366         {
00367                 count++;
00368         }
00369         *(l + count) = '\0';
00370 }
